abstract: Citigroup is inviting bids for Nikko Cordial, Japan’s third-largest brokerage, in an auction that could net the struggling United States-based financial giant more than $5 billion, The Financial Times reported, citing people close to the situation.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup is inviting bids for Nikko Cordial, Japan’s third-largest brokerage, in an auction that could net the struggling United States-based financial giant more than $5 billion, The Financial Times reported, citing people close to the situation.

headline.main: Citigroup Invites Bids for Nikko Cordial, Report Says
